messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

florin to be removed as back up approver from the project code wednesday re please review annual leave pm hi done by because has rights removed back leave submitted under code reach anymore hi please make update other too removed back approver code thank kind regards analyst re please review annual leave pm good morning done by thank re please review annual leave pm please thanks tuesday please review annual leave pm hi please removed backup code thank december re please review annual leave pm hi allocated where leave approver her back requests reach please code leave requests thank kind regards analyst thursday december pm please review annual leave pm hi please log which code needs removed requests thank december re please review annual leave pm tot vin la tine thanks wednesday december pm please review annual leave pm has requested annual leave working days december december please period annual leave starts less than days must approved otherwise out please review annual leave allowance details days allowed days taken days remaining amount annual leave requested give balance remaining days exceed days required by selecting accept decline option accept database updated information decline rejection reason requestor regards guide rejecting messages tab link located top left side screen select requests menu option double pending view form button view details modified marked red asterisk hold mouse over asterisk enter comments comments authorize by pressing accept decline buttons technical issues please
